participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Lila is adventurous, compassionate, and has a creative spirit. She enjoys exploring nature and has a strong connection with animals.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan.

participant_2.personality: Jake is practical, hardworking, and has a good sense of humor. He takes pride in his work and values loyalty in relationships.
participant_2.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

content.text: Hey! How is your day? I like to ride horses and I love to ride horses
